title: Christmas chocolate bark
ingredients: ['350g dark chocolate, chopped', 'Topping option one', '4 tablespoons roughly chopped pistachio nuts', '3 tablespoons freeze-dried raspberries or strawberries', '1 tablespoon coconut flakes', 'Topping option two', '4 tablespoons pink peppercorns', '2 tablespoons chopped pistachio nuts', '2 tablespoons dried currants', 'Topping option three', '100g white chocolate, melted', '3 tablespoons dried cranberries', '3 tablespoons roasted salted pumpkin seeds']
